title: Having a lot of problems with League of Legends Client
body: So recently, I don't know what happened to my league, but I had to use hextech repair tool so that I could repatch my league because it told me that "Update failed" and the it was for an unknown reason. So after that, the LoL Logs folder started to appear on my desktop. After a couple times of using league, I reopened it and the "Update failed" thing popped up again. Now my league doesn't update or open up properly. Is it something about the repair tool? or is it my League? Please help.

replies.body:
The Hextech Repair Tool isn't likely to resolve this issue, as most patching issues are caused by a poor connection to the patching servers. I strongly recommend you work through the common solutions outlined in our [**Patching Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) before we continue troubleshooting this.

Let me know how those steps went.
